text: Shen Jilan (; 29 December 1929 – 28 June 2020) was a Chinese politician. She was a member of the Communist Party of China. She was elected to the 1st National People's Congress in 1954, and had been re-elected for all the subsequent sittings of the National People's Congress over the next 65 years. She was known as the world's longest serving congresswoman. Shen died on 28 June 2020 at the age of 90, from stomach cancer申紀蘭逝世 66次出席人大兩會被稱人大「活化石」、「舉手機器」 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:21st-century Chinese politicians
title: Shen Jilan
